scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy little-plains-process --runtime nodejs20 --trigger-topic little-plains-process --entry-point processCapture --region us-central1 --set-env-vars "$(cat .env.deploy 2>/dev/null || echo '')" --source dist --memory 512MB --timeout 300s
scripts.logs: gcloud functions logs read little-plains-process --region us-central1
